# Aim 2

The model for Aim 2 will be a linear regression model.

The model is

$$
y_{i} =
\beta_0
+ \beta_1 x_{\text{placebo}, i}
+ e_{i}
$$


## 24-month brain atrophy

```{r scatterplotMatrixBrainAtrophy, fig.show = "hide"}
setDens <- function (data, mapping, ...) {
  ggplot(data = data, mapping = mapping) +
    geom_density(..., alpha = 1/2)
}
setPoints <- function (data, mapping, ...) {
  ggplot(data = data, mapping = mapping) +
    geom_point(..., alpha = 1/2)
}
G <- 
  ggpairs(df2,
          columns = c(3, 5, 6),
          mapping = ggplot2::aes(color = studyArm, fill = studyArm),
          diag = list(continuous = setDens),
          lower = list(continuous = setPoints)) +
  theme_bw()
G
ggsave("figures/scatterplotMatrixBrainAtrophy.svg", width = 6, height = 6)
ggsave("figures/scatterplotMatrixBrainAtrophy.png", width = 6, height = 6)
```

Linear model.

```{r}
M <- lm(brainAtrophy ~ studyArm, data = df2)
summary(M)
tidy(M) %>% kable(digits = c(2, 2, 2, 2, 4))
```

Details (not shown).

```{r brainAtrophyDiagnostics, results = "hide", fig.show = "hide"}
res <- residuals(M)
plot(res)
qqnorm(res)
plot(M)
```

```{r}
M1 <- update(M, . ~ studyArm + pctChangeConcRatio)
summary(M1)
M2 <- update(M, . ~ studyArm + concRatioM0)
summary(M2)
```


## Interpretation

* Percent brain atrophy was significantly different in the placebo group compared to the LA group
  * Difference of `r M %>% tidy() %>% filter(term == "studyArmPlacebo") %>% pull(estimate) %>% signif(3)` (p-value = `r M %>% tidy() %>% filter(term == "studyArmPlacebo") %>% pull(p.value) %>% signif(3)`)
* The difference persisted after adjusting for percent change in GSH:GSSG concentration ratio from baseline to 12-month visit
  * Difference of `r M1 %>% tidy() %>% filter(term == "studyArmPlacebo") %>% pull(estimate) %>% signif(3)` (p-value = `r M1 %>% tidy() %>% filter(term == "studyArmPlacebo") %>% pull(p.value) %>% signif(3)`)
* The difference was attenuated after adjusting for baseline GSH:GSSG concentration ratio
  * Difference of `r M2 %>% tidy() %>% filter(term == "studyArmPlacebo") %>% pull(estimate) %>% signif(3)` (p-value = `r M2 %>% tidy() %>% filter(term == "studyArmPlacebo") %>% pull(p.value) %>% signif(3)`)
